blocks.name: cfil
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the set of filters on a set.
blocks.origin: const class cfil { Fil }

blocks.name: diff.cfil.s
diff.cfil.c
diff.cfil.w
df-fil
blocks.content: The set of filters on a set. Definition 1 (axioms FI, FIIa, FIIb, FIII) of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. Filters are used to define the concept of limit in the general case. They are a generalization of the idea of neighborhoods. Suppose you are in ` RR ` . With neighborhoods you can express the idea of a variable that tends to a specific number but you can't express the idea of a variable that tends to infinity. Filters relax the "axioms" of neighborhoods and then succeed in expressing the idea of something that tends to infinity. Filters were invented by Cartan in 1937 and made famous by Bourbaki in his treatise. A notion similar to the notion of filter is the concept of net invented by Moore and Smith in 1922. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: isfil
blocks.content: The predicate "is a filter." (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)

thm isfil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cfil, c1, cfv(cfbas, c1), cfv(cfbas, cv(hs1)), cdm(cfbas), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wi(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  df-fil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1)))
  pweq(cv(hs1), c1)
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wi(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  neeq1d(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls, cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cfbas)
  fvex(cfbas, cv(hs1))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfbas, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cfbas))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfbas, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfbas, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cfbas))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm isfil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cfil, c1, (fBas ` c1), (fBas ` hs1), dom(fBas), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs1),((hs0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà hs0)))
  df-fil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, P(hs1), P(c1), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0), ((hs0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà hs0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, P(hs1)= P(c1))
  pweq(hs1, c1)
  adantl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, (((hs0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà hs0)‚Üî((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà hs0, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà c0)
  neeq1d((hs0 ‚ãÇ P(s0)), emptycls, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0)), hs0 = c0)
  ineq1(hs0, c0, P(s0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cfbas)
  fvex(cfbas, hs1)
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((fBas ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(fBas))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((fBas ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((fBas ` hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(fBas))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 0nelfil
blocks.content: The empty set doesn't belong to a filter. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: fileln0
blocks.content: An element of a filter is nonempty. (Contributed by FL, 24-May-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filsspw
blocks.content: A filter is a subset of the power set of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filelss
blocks.content: An element of a filter is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filss
blocks.content: A filter is closed under taking supersets. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm filss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, c0))
} = {
  syl3c(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(c3, cpw(c1)), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c3)), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  isfil(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c3, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfil)), wss(c3, c1))
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  simp2(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))
  biimpar(wcel(c1, cdm(cfil)), wss(c3, c1), wcel(c3, cpw(c1)))
  elpw2g(c1, cdm(cfil), c3)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c3)), emptycls), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)))
  elpwd(c2, c3, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c3))
  inelcm(c2, c0, cpw(c3))
  rspccv(hs0, cpw(c1), c3, wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(c3)), emptycls), wcel(c3, c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c3)), emptycls), wcel(c3, c0))
  neeq1d(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls, cin(c0, cpw(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c3)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wne(cin(c0, cpw(c3)), emptycls), wcel(c3, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm filss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0)
} = {
  syl3c((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)), c3 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0)), c3 ‚àà P(c1), (c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0)))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0)), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  isfil(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), c3 ‚àà P(c1), c1 ‚àà dom(Fil), c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  simp2(c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  biimpar(c1 ‚àà dom(Fil), c3 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚àà P(c1))
  elpw2g(c1, dom(Fil), c3)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)), (c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3))‚â† ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà P(c3))
  elpwd(c2, c3, c0, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  inelcm(c2, c0, P(c3))
  rspccv(hs0, P(c1), c3, ((c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c3, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0))‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà c0, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3))‚â† ‚àÖ, c3 ‚àà c0)
  neeq1d((c0 ‚ãÇ P(hs0)), emptycls, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3)), hs0 = c3)
  ineq2d(c0, P(hs0), P(c3), hs0 = c3)
  pweq(hs0, c3)
  eleq1(hs0, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚ãÇ P(c3))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c0))
}

blocks.name: filin
blocks.content: A filter is closed under taking intersections. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm filin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3))))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbasssin(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wi(wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3))), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wi(wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3))), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1))
  syl5ss(cin(c2, c3), c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  inss1(c2, c3)
  filelss(c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))))
  com23(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0)))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))
  filss(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cin(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cin(c2, c3), c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm filin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbasssin(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, (‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3))‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3))‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1)
  syl5ss((c2 ‚ãÇ c3), c1, c2, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  inss1(c2, c3)
  filelss(c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
  imp(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)))
  com23(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0))
  3exp2(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚äÜ(c2 ‚ãÇ c3), (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
  filss(c0, c1, hs0, (c2 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
}

blocks.name: filtop
blocks.content: The underlying set belongs to the filter. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jul-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm filtop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
} = {
  mpd(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wne(c0, emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbasne0(c0, c1)
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c0), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  filelss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  mpi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, c0)), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(c1, c1), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, c0))))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c1, c1), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  filss(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, c0))
}

thm filtop(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0)
} = {
  mpd(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c1 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbasne0(c0, c1)
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà c0))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0)
  ex(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0)
  mpd((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), c1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, hs0)
  mpi((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0), c1 ‚äÜ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  imp(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, (c1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c0)))
  3exp2(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà c0)
  filss(c0, c1, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà c0)
}

  ralimi(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  rspcev(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  simp12(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0)))
  df-nel(emptycls, c0)
  3ad2ant3((c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1))))
  ralimi(s1, c0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)))
  mpan2((s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)), (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1))
  ssid((s0 ‚ãÇ s1))
  rspcev(hs0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1), c0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1), hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1))
  sseq1(hs0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1), (s0 ‚ãÇ s1))
  syl(((c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0))), (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(s0 ‚ãÇ s1))))))), c1 ‚àà c0)
  simp13(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0)))
  isfbas2(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c0, c0)
  3ad2ant2((c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ralimi(s0, P(c1), (‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0)‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0), ((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))
  imim1i(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0), s0 ‚àà c0, (c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sylibr((c0 ‚ãÇ P(s0))‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚äÜ s0), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚äÜ s0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: isfildlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ isfild . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfildlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(w0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe)))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantrd(w0, wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl(w0, wi(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, universe))
  expcom(wcel(c2, universe), wss(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssexg(c0, c2, universe)
  com12(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1), wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  dfsbcq(s0, cv(hs0), c0, w1)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), w1))))
  nfim(s0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfan(s0, wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))
  nfv(s0, wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs0), w1)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), w1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), c2), w1, wss(cv(hs0), c2), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs0), w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isfildlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß w1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(w0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantrd(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c2, [c0 / s0]w1, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  expcom(c2 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚äÜ c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexg(c0, c2, universe)
  com12(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1))), (w0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, w0, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1)))
  bibi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1), c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1))
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c1)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c2, [hs0 / s0]w1, c0 ‚äÜ c2, [c0 / s0]w1)
  sseq1(hs0, c0, c2)
  dfsbcq(s0, hs0, c0, w1)
  chvar(s0, hs0, (w0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1))), (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß w1))))
  nfim(s0, w0, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1)))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfbi(s0, hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfan(s0, hs0 ‚äÜ c2, [hs0 / s0]w1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  nfsbc1v(s0, hs0, w1)
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß w1)), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1)))
  bibi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ‚àà c1, (s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß w1), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w1))
  eleq1(s0, hs0, c1)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ‚äÜ c2, w1, hs0 ‚äÜ c2, [hs0 / s0]w1)
  sseq1(s0, hs0, c2)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isfild
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for a set of the form ` { x e. ~P A | ph } ` to be a filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfild(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wsbc(s0, emptycls, w1)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1)), wsbc(s0, cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1))), diffsw(s1, w1))
  syl3anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wrex(s2, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0))))
  3jca(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wcel(c1, c0))
  ssrdv(s0, c0, cpw(c1), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  adantr(wss(cv(s0), c1), w1, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)))
  biimpri(wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)))
  selpw(s0, c1)
  mtod(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0), wsbc(s0, emptycls, w1))
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0), wsbc(s0, emptycls, w1), wa(wss(emptycls, c1), wsbc(s0, emptycls, w1)))
  isfildlem(s0, emptycls, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  simpr(wss(emptycls, c1), wsbc(s0, emptycls, w1))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, c0), wa(wss(c1, c1), wsbc(s0, c1, w1)))
  jctil(w0, wss(c1, c1), wsbc(s0, c1, w1))
  ssid(c1)
  isfildlem(s0, c1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  ralrimiv(s1, cpw(c1), w0, wi(wrex(s2, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  syl5(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c1)), wi(wrex(s2, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s1), c1)
  ex(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wi(wrex(s2, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  rexlimdva(s2, c0, wa(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  impancom(wa(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  3expa(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  3imtr4d(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wa(wss(cv(s2), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1)), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
  adantld(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wss(cv(s2), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
  jctild(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1), wss(cv(s1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))
  simp2(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wa(wss(cv(s2), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), w1))))

  ralrimivv(s1, s2, c0, c0, w0, wcel(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0))

thm isfild(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {

  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß s2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(([s1 / s0]w1 ‚àß[s2 / s0]w1)‚Üí[(s1 ‚ãÇ s2)/ s0]w1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), d(s1, w1))

  elpwi(s1, c1)

  rexlimdva(s2, c0, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚äÜ c1), s2 ‚äÜ s1, s1 ‚àà c0)

  jcad(w0, ((s1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß[s1 / s0]w1)‚àß(s2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß[s2 / s0]w1)), (s1 ‚ãÇ s2)‚äÜ c1, [(s1 ‚ãÇ s2)/ s0]w1)
  a1i(w0, (((s1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß[s1 / s0]w1)‚àß(s2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß[s2 / s0]w1))‚Üí(s1 ‚ãÇ s2)‚äÜ c1))
  ad2antrr(s1 ‚äÜ c1, [s1 / s0]w1, (s2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß[s2 / s0]w1), (s1 ‚ãÇ s2)‚äÜ c1)

  an4(s1 ‚äÜ c1, [s1 / s0]w1, s2 ‚äÜ c1, [s2 / s0]w1)
  expimpd(w0, (s1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß s2 ‚äÜ c1), ([s1 / s0]w1 ‚àß[s2 / s0]w1), [(s1 ‚ãÇ s2)/ s0]w1)

blocks.name: filfi
blocks.content: A filter is closed under taking intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filinn0
blocks.content: The intersection of two elements of a filter can't be empty. (Contributed by FL, 16-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filintn0
blocks.content: A filter has the finite intersection property. Remark below Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by FL, 20-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: filn0
blocks.content: The empty set is not a filter. Remark below Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by FL, 30-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: infil
blocks.content: The intersection of two filters is a filter. Use ~ fiint to extend this property to the intersection of a finite set of filters. Paragraph 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by FL, 17-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: snfil
blocks.content: A singleton is a filter. Example 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by FL, 16-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

thm snfil(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfil, c0)))
} = {
  isfild(hs0, hs1, hs0, csn(c0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  pm4.71ri(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqimss(cv(hs0), c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wsbc(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c0, c0))
  eqid(c0)
  eqsbc3(hs0, c0, c1, c0)
  sylnibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wsbc(hs0, emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(emptycls, c0))
  neneqd(emptycls, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  necomd(emptycls, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(emptycls, c0)), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  eqsbc3(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0)
  3imtr4g(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wsbc(hs0, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  3adant1(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0)))
  com12(wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  biimpri(wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  eqss(cv(hs1), c0)
  a1i(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wa(wsbc(hs0, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))), wsbc(hs0, cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))))
  sylibr(wa(wsbc(hs0, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))), wsbc(hs0, cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  syl2anb(wsbc(hs0, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(hs0, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  elv(hs1, wb(wsbc(hs0, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0)))
  eqsbc3(hs0, cv(hs1), universe, c0)
  sbcid(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, cin(c0, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))

  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), universe))

  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
}

blocks.name: fbasweak
blocks.content: A filter base on any set is also a filter base on any larger set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fbasweak(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c2)))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c2)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  simprd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  isfbas(hs0, hs1, c1, cdm(cfbas), c0)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c2)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c2)), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))))))
  isfbas(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fbasweak(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c2))
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c2), c0 ‚äÜ P(c2), (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c0 ‚ãÇ P((hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  simp2(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ P(c2), c2 ‚àà c3)
  simprd((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c0 ‚ãÇ P((hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))‚â† ‚àÖ))), c0 ‚äÜ P(c1))

  simp1(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ P(c2), c2 ‚àà c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c0 ‚ãÇ P((hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))‚â† ‚àÖ))))), c1 ‚àà dom(fBas))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ P(c2), c2 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà dom(fBas))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  isfbas(hs0, hs1, c1, dom(fBas), c0)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ P(c2), c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P(c2)‚àß(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(c0 ‚ãÇ P((hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)))‚â† ‚àÖ))))))
  isfbas(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: snfbas
blocks.content: Condition for a singleton to be a filter base. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm snfbas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wss(csn(c0), cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wne(c0, emptycls))
  3adant2(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssexg(c0, c1, c2)
  simp2(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2))
  snfil(c0, universe)
  filfbas(csn(c0), c0)
  snssd(c0, cpw(c1), w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpbird(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))
  simp1(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2))
  3ad2ant3(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))
  elpw2g(c1, c2, c0)
  simp3(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, c2))
  fbasweak(csn(c0), c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snfbas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí { c0 } ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), { c0 } ‚àà(fBas ` c1), { c0 } ‚àà(fBas ` c0), { c0 } ‚äÜ P(c1), c1 ‚àà c2)

  syl2anc((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), { c0 } ‚àà(Fil ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3adant2(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexg(c0, c1, c2)
  simp2(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2)
  snfil(c0, universe)
  filfbas({ c0 }, c0)
  snssd(c0, P(c1), (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  mpbird((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà P(c1), c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  simp1(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ c1))
  elpw2g(c1, c2, c0)
  simp3(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà c2)

}

blocks.name: fsubbas
blocks.content: A condition for a set to generate a filter base. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

thm fsubbas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))))

  syl2anc(wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls))
  syl(wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls))
  necon1ai(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))
  fvprc(c2, cfi)
  fbasne0(cfv(cfi, c2), c0)
  biimpar(wcel(c2, universe), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls), wne(c2, emptycls))
  0nelfb(cfv(cfi, c2), c0)
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))), wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wss(cfv(cfi, c2), cpw(c0)), w3a(wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)), wral(hs1, cfv(cfi, c2), wral(hs2, cfv(cfi, c2), wrex(hs0, cfv(cfi, c2), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))), wss(cfv(cfi, c2), cpw(c0)), wss(c2, cpw(c0)))
  fipwss(c2, c0)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)), wral(hs1, cfv(cfi, c2), wral(hs2, cfv(cfi, c2), wrex(hs0, cfv(cfi, c2), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, universe), wne(c2, emptycls))
  ssexd(c2, cpw(c0), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))
  biimpa(wcel(c2, universe), wne(c2, emptycls), wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls))
  necon3bid(c2, emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls, wcel(c2, universe))

  fiin(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))
  ssid(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  rspcev(hs0, cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfi, c2), wss(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wb(wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wa(wss(cfv(cfi, c2), cpw(c0)), w3a(wne(cfv(cfi, c2), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)), wral(hs1, cfv(cfi, c2), wral(hs2, cfv(cfi, c2), wrex(hs0, cfv(cfi, c2), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))))
  isfbas2(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cfi, c2))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cfi, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfi, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfi, c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ P(c0)‚àß c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà(fi ` c2))), (fi ` c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)

  simpr3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ P(c0), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà(fi ` c2))

blocks.name: fbasfip
blocks.content: A filter base has the finite intersection property. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fbasfip(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))))
} = {
  mtbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(hs0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0)))))
  nrexdv(hs0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0))))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wn(wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0)))), wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cfn)
  anim1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c0)
  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0)))))
  fbssint(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  mtod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))))), wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))), wn(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls)))
  nsyl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  mtod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  0nelfb(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  biimpcd(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), emptycls, c0)
  ss0(cv(hs1))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))), wi(wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs1), emptycls)))
  biimprcd(wss(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))), wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  sseq2(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(hs0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  elfi(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0, cfv(cfbas, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  diff.hs1.w(wn(wceq(emptycls, cint(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfbas, c1))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚Üí ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà(fi ` c0))
} = {

  fbssint(hs1, c0, c1, hs0)
  mtod(((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ hs0)), ‚àÖ = ‚ãÇ hs0, hs1 ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  adantrr((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ hs0, ¬¨ hs1 ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  nsyl(((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), hs1 ‚äÜ ‚àÖ, hs1 = ‚àÖ)
  mtod(((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), hs1 = ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), hs1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)
  0nelfb(c0, c1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs1 = ‚àÖ ‚Üí ‚àÖ ‚àà c0))
  biimpcd(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 = ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)
  eleq1(hs1, emptycls, c0)
  ss0(hs1)
  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ hs0, (‚àÖ = ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚Üí hs1 ‚äÜ ‚àÖ))
  biimprcd(hs1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ hs0, ‚àÖ = ‚ãÇ hs0, hs1 ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  sseq2(emptycls, ‚ãÇ hs0, hs1)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (‚àÖ ‚àà(fi ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), ‚àÖ = ‚ãÇ hs0)), ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå)

  elfi(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0, (fBas ` c1))

blocks.name: fbunfip
blocks.content: A helpful lemma for showing that certain sets generate filters. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fbunfip(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wb(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(c0, c2)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(c0, c2)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wa(wa(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wral(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(c0, c2)))), wa(wa(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wn(w3o(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))

  3ioran(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  df-3an(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl5rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wa(wa(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wral(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

  ralnex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wceq(emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wa(wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2)))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c0))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, c2))))

  ssfii(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1))

  syl(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wi(wral(s1, cfv(cfi, c2), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wss(c2, cfv(cfi, c2)))

blocks.name: fgval
blocks.content: The filter generating class gives a filter for every filter base. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

thm fgval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wceq(co(c1, cfg, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2dx(hs0, hs1, c1, cfg, c0, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)), universe, cfv(cfbas, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)), cfv(cfbas, c1), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wceq(cfg, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, cfv(cfbas, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)))))
  df-fg(hs0, hs1, s0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c1)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c1)
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wb(wne(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)))
  neeq1d(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls, cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs1), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cfbas, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cfbas)
  elfvex(c0, cfbas, c1)
  id(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)), universe), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  pwexg(c1, cdm(cfbas))
  rabexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)

}

blocks.name: elfg
blocks.content: A condition for elements of a generated filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0), crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  fgval(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls))), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))), wa(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls)))
  elrab(hs0, c2, cpw(c1), wne(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), emptycls, cin(c0, cpw(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c2)
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls), wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfbas)))
  elfvdm(c0, cfbas, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, cdm(cfbas), c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))))
  3bitr4i(wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c2))))
  exbii(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c2)))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c2))))
  elin(cv(s0), c0, cpw(c2))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c2)), wss(cv(s0), c2))
  selpw(s0, c2)
  n0(s0, cin(c0, cpw(c2)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), emptycls))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, cpw(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
}

  3bitr4i((c0 ‚ãÇ P(c2))‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ P(c2))), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c2)))

blocks.name: ssfg
blocks.content: A filter base is a subset of its generated filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssfg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, co(c1, cfg, c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, co(c1, cfg, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  jca2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  fbelss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  ssid(cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
}

blocks.name: fgss
blocks.content: A bigger base generates a bigger filter. (Contributed by NM, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(co(c1, cfg, c0), co(c1, cfg, c2)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c1, cfg, c0), co(c1, cfg, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  anim2d(wss(c0, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  ssrexv(hs1, c0, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
  elfg(hs1, c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

  ssrexv(hs1, c0, c2, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ c2, (hs0 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0))))

  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, c2, wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))

  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))

thm fgss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))‚Üí((c1[filGen]c0)‚äÜ(c1[filGen]c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚äÜ s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

blocks.name: fgfil
blocks.content: A filter generates itself. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgfil(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wceq(co(c1, cfg, c0), c0))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c1, cfg, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c1, cfg, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  impcomd(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  rexlimdv(hs1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  com34(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  filss(c0, c1, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  ssfg(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
}

thm fgfil(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚Üí(c1[filGen]c0)= c0)
} = {

  syl(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0))), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))

  rexlimdv(hs1, c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0, (hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))
  com34(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà c0)

blocks.name: elfilss
blocks.content: An element belongs to a filter iff any element below it does. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfilss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  3bitr2rd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))))
  ibar(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c2)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  elfg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c1, cfg, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  fgfil(c0, c1)
}

thm elfilss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2))), d(s0, c1))
  3bitr2rd((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), c2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2), (c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2)), c2 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üî(c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2))))
  ibar(c2 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c2 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0)‚Üî(c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c2 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0)‚Üî(c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚äÜ c2))), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  elfg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c2 ‚àà(c1[filGen]c0)‚Üî c2 ‚àà c0))
  eleq2d(c2, (c1[filGen]c0), c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  fgfil(c0, c1)

blocks.name: filfinnfr

blocks.name: filunibas
blocks.content: Recover the base set from a filter. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: filunirn
blocks.content: Two ways to express a filter on an unspecified base. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cfil))), wrex(hs0, universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0))))), wfn(cfil, universe))
  fnmpti(hs1, cfil, universe, crab(hs2, cfv(cfbas, cv(hs1)), wral(hs3, cpw(cv(hs1)), wi(wne(cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs3), cv(hs2))))))
  rabex(hs2, cfv(cfbas, cv(hs1)), wral(hs3, cpw(cv(hs1)), wi(wne(cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs3), cv(hs2)))))

  df-fil(hs1, hs2, hs3)
  fnunirn(hs0, cfil, universe, c0)
  rexlimivw(hs0, universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))))
  ibir(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0)), cfv(cfil, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(cfil, cuni(c0), cv(hs0), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0))))
  filunibas(c0, cv(hs0))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0)), cuni(crn(cfil)))

blocks.name: fbasrn
blocks.content: Given a filter on a domain, produce a filter on the range. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: filuni
blocks.content: The union of a nonempty set of filters with a common base and closed under pairwise union is a filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

thm trfil1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2))))
} = {
  eqssd(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2))), wcel(c2, co(c0, crest, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(c2, co(c0, crest, c2), cin(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), c2), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  sseqin2(c2, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  id(wss(c2, c1))
  ssexg(c2, c1, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  filtop(c0, c1)
  elrestr(c0, cfv(cfil, c1), c2, universe, c1)
  elssuni(c2, co(c0, crest, c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), c2))
  mpbi(wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), c2), wss(co(c0, crest, c2), cpw(c2)))
  restsspw(c0, c2)
  sspwuni(co(c0, crest, c2), c2)
}

  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà c0)
  id(c2 ‚äÜ c1)

blocks.name: trfil3
blocks.content: Conditions for the trace of a filter ` L ` to be a filter. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

thm trfil3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfil, c2)), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfil, c2)), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)))
  trfil2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wn(wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)))))
  dfral2(hs0, c0, wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls))), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls))), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls))), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)))))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)), wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)), wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls))
  nne(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wb(wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c2), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  filelss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  reldisj(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)))), wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1))
  difssd(c1, c2, wss(c2, c1))
  elfilss(hs0, c0, c1, cdif(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c2))
}

  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  dfral2(hs0, c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  notbid((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  bitr4d((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ), (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2))))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2))
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ¬¨(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)
  nne((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), emptycls)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ ‚Üî hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2)), hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, hs0)
  reldisj(hs0, c1, c2)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, ((c1 \ c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(c1 \ c2))), (c1 \ c2)‚äÜ c1)
  difssd(c1, c2, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  elfilss(hs0, c0, c1, (c1 \ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ c2))
}

blocks.name: trfilss
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a member of the filter, then the filter truncated to ` A ` is a subset of the original filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm trfilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(co(c0, crest, c2), c0))
} = {
  eqsstrd(co(c0, crest, c2), c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  restval(hs0, c0, cfv(cfil, c1), c2, c0)
  frnd(cmpt(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), c0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  fmpttd(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  an32s(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), c0))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), c0))
  filin(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trfilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c0[|`t]c2)‚äÜ c0)
} = {
  eqsstrd((c0[|`t]c2), c0, ran((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))), (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  restval(hs0, c0, (Fil ` c1), c2, c0)
  frnd((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), c0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  fmpttd(hs0, c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), c0, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  an32s(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà c0)
  3expa(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà c0)
  filin(c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
}

blocks.name: fgtr
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a member of the filter, then truncating ` F ` to ` A ` and regenerating the behavior outside ` A ` using ` filGen ` recovers the original filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgtr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)), c0))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  sseqtrd(co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)), c0, co(c1, cfg, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)), co(c1, cfg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(co(c0, crest, c2), c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  trfilss(c0, c1, c2)
  fgss(co(c0, crest, c2), c1, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wceq(co(c1, cfg, c0), c0))
  fgfil(c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  filelss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  sylancl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), co(c0, crest, c2)), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c2), cv(hs0)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), co(c0, crest, c2)))
  elrestr(c0, cfv(cfil, c1), c2, c0, cv(hs0))
  inss1(cv(hs0), c2)
  rspcev(hs1, cin(cv(hs0), c2), co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c2), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs0), c2), cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c2)), wss(co(c0, crest, c2), cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfbas, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfil, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfil, c2)), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbncp(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cfil, c2)), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))), wss(c2, c1))
  trfil3(c0, c1, c2)
  filfbas(co(c0, crest, c2), c2)
  syl5ss(co(c0, crest, c2), cpw(c1), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  restsspw(c0, c2)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cpw(c2), cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  filelss(c0, c1, c2)
  sspwb(c2, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  filtop(c0, c1)
  fbasweak(co(c0, crest, c2), c2, c1, c0)
  elfg(hs1, co(c0, crest, c2), c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfg, co(c0, crest, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, crest, c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cin(cv(hs0), c2), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm fgtr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2))= c0)
} = {
  eqssd((c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2)), c0, (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  sseqtrd((c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2)), c0, (c1[filGen]c0), (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2))‚äÜ(c1[filGen]c0), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c1), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚äÜ c0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  trfilss(c0, c1, c2)
  fgss((c0[|`t]c2), c1, c0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (c1[filGen]c0)= c0)
  fgfil(c0, c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, (c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2)), (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  sylibrd((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2)), (hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0)))
  jcad((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚äÜ c1))
  ex(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, hs0)
  ex((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0))
  sylancl(((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ hs0)
  3expa(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  elrestr(c0, (Fil ` c1), c2, c0, hs0)
  inss1(hs0, c2)
  rspcev(hs1, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0[|`t]c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ hs0, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0)
  sseq1(hs1, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), hs0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚àà(c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2))‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), hs1 ‚äÜ hs0))), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c2), (c0[|`t]c2)‚äÜ P(c1), c1 ‚àà c0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(fBas ` c2), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  fbncp(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, ((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2)‚Üî ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  trfil3(c0, c1, c2)
  filfbas((c0[|`t]c2), c2)
  syl5ss((c0[|`t]c2), P(c1), P(c2), (c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  restsspw(c0, c2)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), P(c2)‚äÜ P(c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, c2)
  sspwb(c2, c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c0)
  filtop(c0, c1)
  fbasweak((c0[|`t]c2), c2, c1, c0)
  elfg(hs1, (c0[|`t]c2), c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[filGen](c0[|`t]c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs1.c((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c0[|`t]c2))
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: trfg
blocks.content: The trace operation and the ` filGen ` operation are inverses to one another in some sense, with ` filGen ` growing the base set and ` |``t ` shrinking it. See ~ fgtr for the converse cancellation law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm trfg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(co(c2, cfg, c0), crest, c1), c0))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, co(co(c2, cfg, c0), crest, c1), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqsstrd(co(co(c2, cfg, c0), crest, c1), c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, co(c2, cfg, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(co(c2, cfg, c0), crest, c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, co(c2, cfg, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(co(c2, cfg, c0), cfv(cfil, c2)), wcel(c1, c0))
  restval(hs0, co(c2, cfg, c0), cfv(cfil, c2), c1, c0)
  frnd(cmpt(hs0, co(c2, cfg, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c1)), c0, co(c2, cfg, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)))
  fmpttd(hs0, co(c2, cfg, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c1), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  simplbda(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c2)))
  elfg(hs1, c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c1), c1), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpll1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  simprl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  a1i(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c1), c1))
  inss2(cv(hs0), c1)

blocks.name: trnei
blocks.content: The trace, over a set ` A ` , of the filter of the neighborhoods of a point ` P ` is a filter iff ` P ` belongs to the closure of ` A ` . (This is ~ trfil2 applied to a filter of neighborhoods.) (Contributed by FL, 15-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cfinfil
blocks.content: Relative complements of the finite parts of an infinite set is a filter. When ` A = NN ` the set of the relative complements is called Frechet's filter and is used to define the concept of limit of a sequence. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jul-2008.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: supfil
blocks.content: The supersets of a nonempty set which are also subsets of a given base set form a filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Aug-2015.)

thm supfil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wss(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  isfild(hs0, hs1, hs2, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wss(c2, cv(s0))), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))
  elrab(s0, cv(hs0), cpw(c0), wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))
  sseq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wsbc(hs0, c0, wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wss(c2, c0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wb(wsbc(hs0, c0, wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  sbcieg(hs0, c0, universe, wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(c2, c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  sylnibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wsbc(hs0, emptycls, wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wss(c2, emptycls))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls), wn(wss(c2, emptycls)))
  necon3ai(c2, emptycls, wss(c2, emptycls))
  ss0(c2)
  sbcie(hs0, emptycls, wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(c2, emptycls))
  0ex()
  sseq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c2)

blocks.name: zfbas
blocks.content: The set of upper sets of integers is a filter base on ` ZZ ` , which corresponds to convergence of sequences on ` ZZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfbas() {
  |- wcel(crn(cuz), cfv(cfbas, cz))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(crn(cuz), cfv(cfbas, cz)), wss(crn(cuz), cpw(cz)), w3a(wne(crn(cuz), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, crn(cuz)), wral(hs0, crn(cuz), wral(hs1, crn(cuz), wne(cin(crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cuz), cpw(cz)), wf(cuz, cz, cpw(cz)))
  frn(cuz, cz, cpw(cz))
  3pm3.2i(wne(crn(cuz), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, crn(cuz)), wral(hs0, crn(cuz), wral(hs1, crn(cuz), wne(cin(crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls))))
  ne0ii(crn(cuz), cfv(cuz, nat1))
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cuz, nat1), crn(cuz)), wfn(cuz, cz), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  fnfvelrn(cuz, cz, nat1)
  nelir(emptycls, crn(cuz))
  mtbir(wcel(emptycls, crn(cuz)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  nrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wn(wceq(cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))))
  uzid(cv(hs0))
  n0i(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(emptycls, crn(cuz)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wfn(cuz, cz))
  ax-mp(wfn(cuz, cz), wf(cuz, cz, cpw(cz)))
  uzf()
  ffn(cuz, cz, cpw(cz))
  fvelrnb(hs0, cuz, cz, emptycls)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, crn(cuz), wne(cin(crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cuz)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cuz))), wne(cin(crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuz)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  uzin2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  pwid(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  inex1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  inelcm(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(crn(cuz), cfv(cfbas, cz)), wa(wss(crn(cuz), cpw(cz)), w3a(wne(crn(cuz), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, crn(cuz)), wral(hs0, crn(cuz), wral(hs1, crn(cuz), wne(cin(crn(cuz), cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))))), wcel(cz, universe))
  zex()
  isfbas(hs0, hs1, cz, universe, crn(cuz))

blocks.name: uzrest
blocks.content: The restriction of the set of upper sets of integers to an upper set of integers is the set of upper sets of integers based at a point above the cutoff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzrest(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), cima(cuz, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))
} = {
  eqssd(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), cima(cuz, c1), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl5eqss(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), cima(cuz, c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cuz), cin(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(c0, cz))
  mp2an(wceq(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cuz), cin(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(crn(cuz), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  restval(hs0, crn(cuz), universe, c1, universe)
  frnd(cmpt(hs0, crn(cuz), cin(cv(hs0), c1)), cima(cuz, c1), crn(cuz), wcel(c0, cz))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cz), wf(cmpt(hs0, crn(cuz), cin(cv(hs0), c1)), crn(cuz), cima(cuz, c1)), wral(hs0, crn(cuz), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c1), cima(cuz, c1))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cz), wral(hs0, crn(cuz), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c1), cima(cuz, c1))), wral(hs1, cz, wcel(cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1), cima(cuz, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cz, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1), cima(cuz, c1)))
  eqeltrd(cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1), cima(cuz, c1), cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  mp3an12i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wcel(cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0))), cima(cuz, c1)), wfn(cuz, cz), wss(c1, cz), wcel(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)), c1))
  elin2d(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)), c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  eleqtrrd(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)), cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1), cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wcel(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)), cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)))), wcel(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)), cz))
  ifcl(c0, cz, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0))
  uzid(cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)))
  syl5eq(cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1), cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0))), cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  ineq2i(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), c1, cfv(cuz, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wceq(cin(cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, c0)), cfv(cuz, cif(c0, cv(hs1), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, c0)))))

blocks.name: uzfbas
blocks.content: The set of upper sets of integers based at a point in a fixed upper integer set like ` NN ` is a filter base on ` NN ` , which corresponds to convergence of sequences on ` NN ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzfbas(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cima(cuz, c1), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cima(cuz, c1), cfv(cfbas, c1), co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), wcel(c0, cz))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, co(crn(cuz), crest, c1))))
  mtoi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(emptycls, co(crn(cuz), crest, c1)), wcel(emptycls, crn(cuz)))
  ax-mp(wn(wcel(emptycls, crn(cuz))), wcel(crn(cuz), cfv(cfbas, cz)))
  0nelfb(crn(cuz), cz)
  sseld(emptycls, co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), crn(cuz), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl6eqss(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), crn(cuz), cima(cuz, c1), wcel(c0, cz))
  uzrest(c0, c1)
  imassrn(cuz, c1)
  mp2an(wb(wcel(co(crn(cuz), crest, c1), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wn(wcel(emptycls, co(crn(cuz), crest, c1)))), wcel(crn(cuz), cfv(cfbas, cz)), wss(c1, cz))
  zfbas()
  eqsstri(c1, cz, cfv(cuz, c0))
  uzssz(c0)
  trfbas2(crn(cuz), cz, c1)
}
